title: Fixed MetadataHierarchyDetector DI Issue
details: Successfully fixed dependency injection issue in ServiceRegistration.cs where MetadataHierarchyDetector was registered as IMetadataHierarchyDetector interface but services were requesting the concrete class. Added a concrete class registration that returns the interface implementation. This fixed the "No service for type 'NotebookAutomation.Core.Utils.MetadataHierarchyDetector' has been registered" error.
